entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:40 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
